# myscribae_script_group (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "myscribae_script_group" "example" {
	alt_id 			= "example_script"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `alt_id` (String) The alt id of the script group
- `provider_id` (String) The provider id of the script group
